item.title: Standardize Your Planned Development with Imperial
item.dc:creator: cleetus
item.content:encoded: Dress up your planned development with elegant products from Imperial. Our products are made to endure the elements and will last a lifetime.

item.dc:creator: jonathon
item.content:encoded:
[fusion_builder_container hundred_percent="no" hundred_percent_height="no" hundred_percent_height_scroll="no" hundred_percent_height_center_content="yes" equal_height_columns="no" menu_anchor="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="center center" background_repeat="no-repeat" fade="no" background_parallax="none" enable_mobile="no" parallax_speed="0.3" video_mp4="" video_webm="" video_ogv="" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_loop="yes" video_mute="yes" video_preview_image="" border_size="" border_color="" border_style="solid" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" padding_top="" padding_right="" padding_bottom="" padding_left=""][fusion_builder_row][fusion_builder_column type="1_1" layout="1_1" spacing="" center_content="no" link="" target="_self" min_height="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" background_repeat="no-repeat" hover_type="none" border_size="0" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" padding_top="" padding_right="" padding_bottom="" padding_left="" dimension_margin="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset="" last="no"][fusion_title margin_top="" margin_bottom="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" size="1" content_align="left" style_type="default" sep_color=""] Have you paid your mailbox some attention this year? hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" size="1" content_align="center" style_type="default" sep_color=""] Here are some maintenance tips.... [/fusion_title][fusion_checklist icon="fa-chess-king fas" iconcolor="" circle="" circlecolor="" size="" divider="" divider_color="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id=""][fusion_li_item icon=""] If your mailbox is mounted on a pole or post,check it's stabilityand make sure it isproperly anchored. [/fusion_li_item][fusion_li_item icon=""] Your mailbox identifies your address, not only for the letter carrier but for the police, the fire department, emergency workers and other service providers. Make sure your address appears on both sides of the mailbox, so people who need to find you can do so, and so can your mail. [/fusion_li_item][fusion_li_item icon=""] Check the door and it's hinges. Make sure it closes properly to keep your mail in and the wind and rain out. [/fusion_li_item][fusion_li_item icon=""] Sand and repaint or replace your mailboxif needed. Once the mailbox surface has been cleaned you can apply spray paint. [/fusion_li_item][fusion_li_item icon=""] Imperial stocks parts and accessoriesfor maintaining your mailbox. animation_offset=""]https://imperialmailboxsystems.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/imperial_webstore_macbook_2.jpg[/fusion_imageframe][fusion_text columns="2" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" class="" id=""] In the past, our customers viewed black and white renderings in our printed catalog to try and imagine what their new mailbox would look like. In time, we completely re-designed the catalog, printed it in full-color and incorporated color photographs of all our products. Shortly after, we re-designed our website and incorporated these new photos as well as an interactive online catalog into our customers website experience. Our customers have appreciated these improvements in helping them visualize their finished products as well as providing more information about individual products. To take these improvements another step forward, Imperial is proud to introduce our new web store! Formerly, to place an order a customer had to call our representatives and go through each configuration verbally over the phone. While that procedure served its purpose, we understand that today's busy world needs the convenience of online shopping. Imperial is dedicated to providing you the convenience of shopping with us 24 hours a day! Please browse our web store and take advantage of this new feature today! Interactive Builders

[/fusion_title][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" class="" id=""] We are most excited to reveal our interactive product builders. This enables you to select any available option and see it "built" in real-time. This will aid in the selection process by providing accurate photo renderings of a particular mailbox system. If you don't like how one option appears or if you want to compare how two separate options look, just select those options and see it for yourself. No longer do you need to request a particular image - just go to the builder and see your configuration now! Once you are satisfied with your configuration you can click on the add-to-cart button and check out. overlook the importance of physical mail. Yet, for many, receiving mail is still an essential part of their daily lives. This is where Imperial Mailbox Systems shines. With our commitment to quality, durability, and impeccable design, Imperial stands as a trusted leader in providing top-of-the-line mailbox solutions. In this blog post, we'll delve into the reasons why you should choose Imperial Mailbox Systems for all your mailbox needs. [/fusion_text][fusion_title title_type="text" rotation_effect="bounceIn" display_time="1200" highlight_effect="circle" loop_animation="off" highlight_width="9" highlight_top_margin="0" before_text="" rotation_text="" highlight_text="" after_text="" title_link="off" link_url="" link_target="_self" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" sticky_display="normal,sticky" class="" id="" content_align_medium="" content_align_small="" content_align="left" size="1" font_size="" animated_font_size="" fusion_font_family_title_font="" fusion_font_variant_title_font="" line_height="" letter_spacing="" text_shadow="no" text_shadow_vertical="" text_shadow_horizontal="" text_shadow_blur="0" text_shadow_color="" margin_top_medium="" margin_right_medium="" margin_bottom_medium="" margin_left_medium="" margin_top_small="" margin_right_small="" margin_bottom_small="" margin_left_small="" margin_top="" margin_right="" margin_bottom="" margin_left="" margin_top_mobile="" margin_bottom_mobile="" text_color="" animated_text_color="" gradient_font="no" gradient_start_color="" gradient_end_color="" gradient_start_position="0" gradient_end_position="100" gradient_type="linear" radial_direction="center center" linear_angle="180" highlight_color="" style_type="default" sep_color="" link_color="" link_hover_color="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset=""]

Unmatched Quality and Durability:

[/fusion_title][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" content_alignment_medium="" content_alignment_small="" content_alignment="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" sticky_display="normal,sticky" class="" id="" margin_top="" margin_right="" margin_bottom="" margin_left="" font_size="" fusion_font_family_text_font="" fusion_font_variant_text_font="" line_height="" letter_spacing="" text_color="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset=""] Imperial Mailbox Systems prides itself on delivering the highest quality mailboxes on the market. Each mailbox is crafted with meticulous attention to detail and built to withstand the test of time. From residential mailboxes to commercial mail centers, Imperial's products are constructed using premium materials such as heavy-gauge steel, aluminum, and corrosion-resistant coatings. With an Imperial mailbox, you can rest assured that your mail will be protected from the elements and potential vandalism, ensuring its safe delivery every time. [/fusion_text][fusion_title title_type="text" rotation_effect="bounceIn" display_time="1200" highlight_effect="circle" loop_animation="off" highlight_width="9" highlight_top_margin="0" before_text="" rotation_text="" highlight_text="" after_text="" title_link="off" link_url="" link_target="_self" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" sticky_display="normal,sticky" class="" id="" content_align_medium="" content_align_small="" content_align="left" size="1" font_size="" animated_font_size="" fusion_font_family_title_font="" fusion_font_variant_title_font="" line_height="" letter_spacing="" text_shadow="no" text_shadow_vertical="" text_shadow_horizontal="" text_shadow_blur="0" text_shadow_color="" margin_top_medium="" margin_right_medium="" margin_bottom_medium="" margin_left_medium="" margin_top_small="" margin_right_small="" margin_bottom_small="" margin_left_small="" margin_top="" margin_right="" margin_bottom="" margin_left="" margin_top_mobile="" margin_bottom_mobile="" text_color="" animated_text_color="" gradient_font="no" gradient_start_color="" gradient_end_color="" gradient_start_position="0" gradient_end_position="100" gradient_type="linear" radial_direction="center center" linear_angle="180" highlight_color="" style_type="default" sep_color="" link_color="" link_hover_color="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset=""]

Extensive Range of Designs and Customization Options:

[/fusion_title][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" content_alignment_medium="" content_alignment_small="" content_alignment="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" sticky_display="normal,sticky" class="" id="" margin_top="" margin_right="" margin_bottom="" margin_left="" font_size="" fusion_font_family_text_font="" fusion_font_variant_text_font="" line_height="" letter_spacing="" text_color="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset=""] Imperial Mailbox Systems understands that every customer has unique preferences and requirements. That's why they offer an extensive range of mailbox designs and customization options. Whether you're looking for a classic and elegant mailbox that complements your home's aesthetics or a modern and sleek design that stands out, Imperial has you covered. They provide a wide selection of colors, finishes, sizes, and mounting options, allowing you to create a mailbox that perfectly suits your style and needs. [/fusion_text][fusion_title title_type="text" rotation_effect="bounceIn" display_time="1200" highlight_effect="circle" loop_animation="off" highlight_width="9" highlight_top_margin="0" before_text="" rotation_text="" highlight_text="" after_text="" title_link="off" link_url="" link_target="_self" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" sticky_display="normal,sticky" class="" id="" content_align_medium="" content_align_small="" content_align="left" size="1" font_size="" animated_font_size="" fusion_font_family_title_font="" fusion_font_variant_title_font="" line_height="" letter_spacing="" text_shadow="no" text_shadow_vertical="" text_shadow_horizontal="" text_shadow_blur="0" text_shadow_color="" margin_top_medium="" margin_right_medium="" margin_bottom_medium="" margin_left_medium="" margin_top_small="" margin_right_small="" margin_bottom_small="" margin_left_small="" margin_top="" margin_right="" margin_bottom="" margin_left="" margin_top_mobile="" margin_bottom_mobile="" text_color="" animated_text_color="" gradient_font="no" gradient_start_color="" gradient_end_color="" gradient_start_position="0" gradient_end_position="100" gradient_type="linear" radial_direction="center center" linear_angle="180" highlight_color="" style_type="default" sep_color="" link_color="" link_hover_color="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset=""]

Innovative Features for Convenience and Security:

[/fusion_title][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" content_alignment_medium="" content_alignment_small="" content_alignment="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" sticky_display="normal,sticky" class="" id="" margin_top="" margin_right="" margin_bottom="" margin_left="" font_size="" fusion_font_family_text_font="" fusion_font_variant_text_font="" line_height="" letter_spacing="" text_color="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset=""] Imperial Mailbox Systems goes beyond the ordinary mailbox, incorporating innovative features that enhance both convenience and security. Their products include advanced locking mechanisms, anti-fishing technologies, and parcel lockers to accommodate package deliveries. Imperial also offers options for integrated lighting and address plaques, adding an extra touch of functionality and curb appeal. With these features, Imperial ensures that your mail stays secure while providing added convenience for both you and your mail carrier. [/fusion_text][fusion_title title_type="text" rotation_effect="bounceIn" display_time="1200" highlight_effect="circle" loop_animation="off" highlight_width="9" highlight_top_margin="0" before_text="" rotation_text="" highlight_text="" after_text="" title_link="off" link_url="" link_target="_self" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" sticky_display="normal,sticky" class="" id="" content_align_medium="" content_align_small="" content_align="left" size="1" font_size="" animated_font_size="" fusion_font_family_title_font="" fusion_font_variant_title_font="" line_height="" letter_spacing="" text_shadow="no" text_shadow_vertical="" text_shadow_horizontal="" text_shadow_blur="0" text_shadow_color="" margin_top_medium="" margin_right_medium="" margin_bottom_medium="" margin_left_medium="" margin_top_small="" margin_right_small="" margin_bottom_small="" margin_left_small="" margin_top="" margin_right="" margin_bottom="" margin_left="" margin_top_mobile="" margin_bottom_mobile="" text_color="" animated_text_color="" gradient_font="no" gradient_start_color="" gradient_end_color="" gradient_start_position="0" gradient_end_position="100" gradient_type="linear" radial_direction="center center" linear_angle="180" highlight_color="" style_type="default" sep_color="" link_color="" link_hover_color="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset=""]

Commitment to Sustainability:

[/fusion_title][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" content_alignment_medium="" content_alignment_small="" content_alignment="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" sticky_display="normal,sticky" class="" id="" margin_top="" margin_right="" margin_bottom="" margin_left="" font_size="" fusion_font_family_text_font="" fusion_font_variant_text_font="" line_height="" letter_spacing="" text_color="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset=""] As environmental awareness continues to grow, choosing sustainable products becomes increasingly important. Imperial Mailbox Systems recognizes this and incorporates eco-friendly practices in their manufacturing processes. They prioritize using recyclable materials, minimize waste generation, and adhere to sustainable production practices whenever possible. By choosing Imperial, you're not only investing in a quality mailbox but also supporting a company that values environmental responsibility. item.title: What is the required height of a mailbox?
item.dc:creator: searchaltyics
item.content:encoded:
What is the required height of a mailbox?

When it comes to installing a mailbox, adhering to the proper height requirements is essential. Not only does it ensure the convenience and ease of mail delivery on both recipient and deliverers ends, but it also ensures that you comply with regulations set forth by the United States Postal Service (USPS). There are many other considerations that you should take into account when installing a mailbox, but the height is arguably the most important. So, you may be wondering: What is the required height of a mailbox?

The Required Height of a Mailbox

According to USPS regulations, the standard height requirement for a curbside mailbox is 41 to 45 inches from the ground to the bottom of the mailbox. This measurement ensures that mail carriers can easily access and deliver mail without excessive bending or stretching, as well as ensuring their safety. Additionally, the USPS specifies that the mailbox should be set back 6 to 8 inches from the edge of the curb to provide sufficient clearance for passing vehicles. However, it's important to note that these height requirements may vary in some localities. It is recommended to check with your local postmaster or municipality for any specific guidelines or variations in your area. They can provide you with the necessary information to ensure your mailbox is installed correctly and complies with local regulations.

Additional Mailbox Size Requirements

Apart from mailbox height, there are other considerations to keep in mind when installing a mailbox. The USPS also specifies requirements for the size and type of approved mailboxes. The USPS approves various types of mailboxes, including post-mounted mailboxes, curbside mailboxes, and wall-mounted mailboxes. Each type has specific regulations governing its installation and placement, so you should make sure that you know the rules for each kind. If you prefer a door slot or a wall-mounted mailbox in particular, it's important to gain permission from the local postmaster. The USPS has specific regulations regarding the use of door slots or wall-mounted mailboxes, including size, location, and accessibility, which you can find by contacting your local postmaster. It's also crucial to ensure that the mailbox is easily accessible to both the mail carrier and the homeowner. Avoid placing any obstructions such as overgrown shrubs or trees that may hinder mail delivery. Additionally, make sure your mailbox is sturdy, well-maintained, and free from any damage or hazards. This will ensure the safety and security of both your property and the hardworking USPS drivers who deliver your mail.

Conclusion

At Imperial Mailbox Systems, we understand the importance of adhering to USPS regulations for mailbox installation. We offer a wide range of high-quality mailboxes that meet USPS standards and can complement the aesthetic of your property. Whether you're looking for a post-mounted mailbox, curbside mailbox, or wall-mounted mailbox, we have options that will suit your needs. Were dedicated to providing you with high-quality mailboxes that meet USPS standards and will add an excellent finishing touch to your home. Contact us today to explore our range of mailbox options and ensure your mailbox installation is in compliance with all necessary requirements.

item.title: Types of Residential Mailboxes
item.dc:creator: searchaltyics
item.content:encoded:
Types of Residential Mailboxes

If youre in need of a residential mailbox, youre in luck regardless of who you are! There is a wide range of options available to suit various preferences and architectural styles. Whether you are looking for a traditional mailbox or a modern design that complements your home, youll certainly be able to find one that suits your needs and tastes. Here, well go over some of the most common types of residential mailboxes.

Post-Mounted Mailboxes

Post-mounted mailboxes are a popular choice for many homeowners. These mailboxes are typically mounted on a sturdy post installed near the edge of the property. They come in various materials such as metal, plastic, and wood, allowing you to choose a style that suits your taste. Post-mounted mailboxes often feature a mailbox on top and can also feature a separate compartment for outgoing mail, providing convenience for both mail carriers and residents.

Wall-Mounted Mailboxes

Wall-mounted mailboxes offer a space-saving solution for homes with limited yard space or architectural constraints. These mailboxes are attached directly to the exterior wall of the house, usually near the entrance. They come in a variety of styles, including modern, contemporary, and traditional designs, allowing you to find the perfect match for your home's aesthetics.

Locking Mailboxes

If security is a top priority for you, a locking mailbox is an excellent choice. These mailboxes feature a lockable compartment that provides added protection for your mail and packages. Locking mailboxes are available in various styles, including post-mounted and wall-mounted options, ensuring both security and style. If youre worried about the security of your mailbox, these can give you an added sense of relief.

Decorative Mailboxes

For homeowners who want to add a touch of personality and charm to their property, decorative mailboxes are an ideal choice. These mailboxes come in a wide range of designs and themes, such as ornate patterns, animal motifs, and custom finishes. These mailboxes also come in different types of mailboxes, so you can have a post- or wall-mounted decorative mailbox depending on your preference. Whether you prefer a whimsical design or a classic look, there is a decorative mailbox to suit your style and enhance your home's curb appeal.

Multi-Unit Mailboxes

Multi-unit mailboxes are designed for residential complexes, apartments, or condominiums where multiple mailboxes are needed in a single location. These mailboxes are typically larger and can accommodate mail for multiple households. They provide a centralized and organized solution for mail delivery in shared living spaces or retail spaces, allowing for ease and convenience.

Conclusion

When choosing a residential mailbox, consider factors such as durability, weather resistance, and functionality. It's also important to check local regulations or homeowners' association guidelines regarding mailbox specifications and installation requirements. At Imperial Mailbox Systems, we understand the importance of finding the perfect mailbox that complements your home and meets your needs. We offer a wide range of high-quality residential mailboxes in different styles, materials, and finishes. Whether you prefer a classic post-mounted mailbox, a modern wall-mounted design, or a decorative mailbox that adds a touch of personality, we have options to suit your taste. Contact us for more information, or explore our range of residential mailboxes and find the ideal mailbox that combines functionality, aesthetics, and durability for your home.
